hero.title: AI recipes generator from any ingredients
hero.description: Simply select or enter ingredients, and our AI will create random, creative, and easy-to-follow recipes for you. No more "what can i make with these ingredients" stress.

features.title: Smart AI-Powered Culinary Features
features.description: Transform your cooking journey with cutting-edge AI technology, multi-language support, stunning visual generation, and seamless cross-platform experience designed for food lovers worldwide.
features.aiGenerationDesc: Automatically selects the best AI model based on language: Qwen Plus for Chinese, GPT-4o Mini for English, ensuring optimal generation results
features.imageModelsDesc: Automatically selects image models based on language: Wanx for Chinese, Flux Schnell for English, generating high-quality dish images
features.customIngredientsDesc: Input any ingredients you have in your refrigerator for AI to craft delicious meals
features.multipleCuisineDesc: Support for global cuisine styles from Chinese to Western, Japanese to Indian
features.multiLanguageDesc: Support for multiple languages including English and Chinese to meet diverse user needs
features.responsiveDesc: Fully optimized for all devices - desktop, tablet, and mobile, providing seamless experience across all platforms

tutorial.title: How to Use AI Recipe Generator?
tutorial.subtitle: Quick Tutorial
tutorial.description: Follow these simple steps to create delicious recipes from your ingredients in just minutes.

step1.title: Select or Enter Ingredients
step1.description: Choose from our extensive ingredient database or input custom ingredients(press Enter). Simply search, select, and build your ingredient list. Our AI generator will work with whatever ingredients you have available.

step2.title: Generate Your Recipe
step2.description: Click 'Generate' button and watch our AI create a personalized recipe just for you. Choose your preferred cuisine style, cooking time, and difficulty level. The AI will analyze your ingredients and create the perfect recipe.

step3.title: Get Your Recipe & Image
step3.description: Based on your selected ingredients, get your recipe first and then the image. You can copy ingredients, seasoning, instructions and the beautiful AI-generated image. You can also share your recipe with friends or save for later.

review1.name: Jane Doe
review1.comment: Finally found something that actually works! No more staring at my fridge wondering what to cook. This thing gives me real ideas, not just basic recipes. My dinner game has seriously leveled up since I started using this amazing tool.

review2.name: Mike Thompson
review2.comment: Broke student lifesaver! This AI tool for cooking creates delicious meals from my pantry scraps. Solves my 'what to make with ingredients I have' problem, saves money and tastes great, much better than ramen. My roommates are jealous!

review3.name: Jessica Parker
review3.comment: Love fancy food but hate the price tag. This app actually delivers - gourmet taste without the restaurant bill. My friends think I'm a cooking genius now. The recipe maker feature is gold! Never going back to expensive restaurants.

review4.name: David Harris
review4.comment: This AI recipe generator for free is fantastic! Can make healthy meals with ingredients I have. Nutrition combinations are scientific, essential tool for health enthusiasts who want clean eating. My fitness goals are finally achievable!

review5.name: Emily Rodriguez
review5.comment: Used to burn water, now I'm actually cooking! The step-by-step instructions are so clear even I can follow them. My roommate is shocked. The recipe creator feature is thoughtful, freeing me from the confusion of 'what to make with ingredients I have'.

review6.name: Chris Garcia
review6.comment: Working from home was killing my lunch game. This AI tool for cooking helps me quickly solve lunch problems. Using random ingredients from my fridge, saves time and stays healthy, much better than takeout. My productivity has improved!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: New users receive 100 credits upon registration. Recipe generation is free, but image generation consumes 1 credit per image. We will soon launch service packages and reward systems to provide more ways to earn credits.
faq.q2: Can I add ingredients that aren't listed?
faq.a2: Yes! Simply type any ingredient into the search box and press Enter. Custom ingredients show up with a white background and yellow text, so you can easily spot them. Our AI will create recipes with whatever ingredients you add!
faq.a3: We first use AI to generate recipes based on the ingredients you select and input. Once the recipe is created, we use AI again to generate corresponding images based on the recipe name.
faq.q4: How long does the transformation process take?
faq.a4: Most recipes are generated in 20-60 seconds. The exact time depends on the number of ingredients selected, recipe count, AI model chosen, and current server load. More ingredients or multiple recipes may require additional processing time. During peak hours, you may experience slightly longer wait times due to high demand.
faq.q5: How can I provide feedback or report issues?
faq.a5: We'd love to hear from you! Please share your feedback or report any problems by contacting our support team at contact@recipe-easy.com. Your input helps us continuously improve our service.
faq.q6: Can I use the generated images commercially?
faq.a6: Yes. The generated images are free for both personal and commercial use, but please ensure not to infringe on other brands' copyright.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.heading: What's in my fridge?
introduction.description1: In today's fast-paced world, many people face the daily challenge of deciding what to cook with the ingredients they have available. Whether it's leftover vegetables in the fridge, pantry staples, or seasonal produce, the question "What should I cook today?" is a universal dilemma that affects home cooks everywhere.
introduction.description2: Home cooking offers significant advantages over takeout - it's more cost-effective, healthier, and allows for better control over ingredients and nutrition. However, the barrier to creative cooking often lies in recipe discovery and meal planning. This random food generator was designed to solve this exact problem by providing intelligent, personalized recipe suggestions based on available ingredients.
introduction.description3: The platform focuses on user experience, making recipe generation accessible through intuitive clicking rather than complex typing. By leveraging AI technology, it helps users transform everyday ingredients into delicious, creative meals, making home cooking more enjoyable and less daunting for everyone.
